item.description:
=== Just heard from Dave Home that this event is ON today RAIN OR SHINE ===

Officially, it's the HOW TO TRANSFORM YOUR URBAN DRIVEWAY INTO A BEAUTIFUL GARDEN Workshop!

The Winter Cache Project (teaming up with members of this Permaculture Meetup) is sponsoring a fabulous one-day event (9:30 to 4:00) in which a former driveway at a Munjoy Hill home will start moving in the direction of food production! Great stuff ... Topics will include:

Cold Frames
Raised Beds
Permaculture
Bioremediation
Sheet Mulching

.... and a community potluck lunch.

The organizer and contact person for this event is Margot (margotfine@yahoo.com) if you have any questions!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: The "Tear Up Your Driveway and Grow Food" Workshop
